variable.name: visit_number
variable.description: Visit number when measurement was taken.

variable.name: subjid
variable.comment: Non-enumerated value domain. Deidentified ID where the first two digits denote the origination site of the samples; site key: Marshfield Clinic=16; Vanderbilt University=27; Group Health Cooperative=38; Mayo Clinic=49; Northwestern University=52. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2181644 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: Age_Observation
variable.description: Age when clinical event recorded in record.
variable.comment: External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2003852 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: weight
variable.description: Subject's weight in kilograms over time.
variable.comment: External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2179689 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: height
variable.description: Subject's height in cm over time.
variable.comment: External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2179643 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.

variable.name: Body_Mass_Index
variable.description: Imputed BMI based on 6-months (+/- ) time period.
variable.comment: Non-pregnant BMIs (do not include BMIs during pregnancy or 9 months after pregnancy); calculate BMI whenever there is a distinct weight using the closest height (forward or backward) up to 5 years. If the subject's age at weight observation is <20 years, go forward or backwards up to a year; if there are 2 closest height values (froward or backward), select either of them to calculate BMI. External variable resource: caDSR; enter source ID: 2006410 (Public ID) NOTE: The codes from NCI Thesaurus are based on the Version 10.07d (July 26, 2010). The source files can be accessed from: http://evs.nci.nih.gov/ftp1/NCI_Thesaurus.
